body:
@soc1c @YazzyYaz @meowsbits @BelfordZ @sorpaas there are also a few further ECIP pull requests pending which look like they could be merged as Draft right now, or if they need human consensus, we could try to fit them in too ...

- [ECIP-1085: Simple Subroutines for the EVM proposal](https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/pull/286)
- [Move ECIP-1078 ("fix") to Last Call. Move ECIP-1079 ("redo") to Withdrawn](https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/pull/285) <-- **this should happen before the meeting**
- [Withdraw ECIP-1081 Do Not Dox ECIP Editors](https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/pull/283)
- [ECIP-1084: Hard cap on the gaslimit for the ETC mainnet as an in-protocol consensus rule](https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/pull/259)
- [ECIP-1083: Remove Contract Size Limit](https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/pull/249) <-- WIP needs changing to Draft and then LGTM
- [ECIP-1082: Fork identifier (`forkid`) fork list specification](https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/pull/247)

If we can whack through all of this with quick yes/nos then our working set of pull requests will be much more manageable.   We would defer the ones about ECIP process itself to another call.   We aren't going to have time for that, but we might have time to do the "paperwork" on the others.

- [ECIP-0001: Process ECIP-0001, Replacement of ECIP-1000](https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/pull/277)
- [ECIP-1077: Meta Specification Establishing Fork ECIPs (Using Pull Request development pattern)](https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/pull/224)
- [ECIP-1000: propose only one meta ecip per hard fork] (https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/pull/221) .  CC @shanejonas.
- [ECIP-1000: ECIP Coordinators ](https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/pull/211)
